entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
